title: Lab News
Welcome
text:
Welcome to ADALab 👋
We are a research group focused on Systems Immunology, Proteomics, and Cancer Biology.
💡 Explore our lab: - 👩‍🔬 People - 🔬 Projects - 📚 Publications - 📰 News - ⚙️ Tools - 📬 Contact

title: About ADALab
text:
About ADALab
We investigate how viral infections and co-infections shape the immune system and cancer progression.
Principal Investigator: Dr. Jiri Adamec
Institution: LSU HEALTH NEW ORLEANS / LSU LCMC Health Cancer Center]

title: Instruments
text:
import yaml, html from IPython.display import HTML, display

Load YAML
with open(“data/instruments.yml”,“r”,encoding=“utf-8”) as f: inst = yaml.safe_load(f) or []
inst.sort(key=lambda x: (x.get(“category”,““), x.get(”name”,““)))


Pure HTML only (avoid Markdown headers so blocks don’t split HTML)
css = ““”

““”
html_out = [“] cats = [] for item in inst: c = item.get(“category”,““) if c not in cats: cats.append(c)
for c in cats: html_out.append(f”

{html.escape(c)}

“) html_out.append(’

’) for it in [x for x in inst if x.get(“category”,““)==c]: name = html.escape(it.get(“name”,““)) vendor = html.escape(it.get(”vendor”,““)) if it.get(”vendor”) else “” summary= html.escape(it.get(“summary”,““)) if it.get(”summary”) else “” img = it.get(“image”) specs = it.get(“specs”) or {} links = it.get(“links”) or [] tags = it.get(“tags”) or []
    card = ['<div class="inst-card">']
    if img: card.append(f"<img src='{html.escape(img)}' alt='{name}'>")
    card.append(f"<h3>{name}</h3>")
    if vendor:  card.append(f"<p><strong>{vendor}</strong></p>")
    if summary: card.append(f"<p>{summary}</p>")
    if specs:
        card.append("<dl class='inst-specs'>")
        for k, v in specs.items():
            card.append(f"<dt>{html.escape(str(k))}</dt><dd>{html.escape(str(v))}</dd>")
        card.append("</dl>")
    if links:
        line = " · ".join(
            f"<a href='{html.escape(l['url'])}' target='_blank' rel='noopener'>{html.escape(l['text'])}</a>"
            for l in links if 'url' in l and 'text' in l
        )
        if line: card.append(f"<p>{line}</p>")
    if tags:
        card.append("<div class='inst-badges'>" + "".join(f"<span>{html.escape(str(t))}</span>" for t in tags) + "</div>")
    card.append("</div>")
    html_out.append("".join(card))
html_out.append("</div>")  # close grid for this category
display(HTML(css + ““.join(html_out)))

title: Publications
text:
Publications
Here are our lab’s publications:
